means: 卷收( furl的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: He unstepped the mast and furled the sail and tied it.
sentence.Network_cn: 他拔下桅杆,把帆卷起,系住.

sentence.Network_en: I've had a basinful of bowler - hat and furled - umbrella parts.
sentence.Network_cn: 我老是演戴硬圆顶礼帽和携带雨伞的平民角色,实在是演腻了.

sentence.Network_en: The ship continued to forge ahead after the sails were furled.
sentence.Network_cn: 卷帆以后,船继续平稳而缓慢地前进.

list.abs: But furling fueling that increase a drop in prices ., 但是销售上涨价格下跌.
航海及海运专业英语词汇(F6) ... furl 折叠n.折叠 furling line 卷帆索 Furlong 弗隆.
272. 扬帆 hoist sail273. 收帆 furl sail274. 舵 rudder
airtight testing and ignition program of furl gas system in cracking furnace ., 裂解炉燃料气系统密闭测试及点火程序.

entry.tran: 收拢(伞等);卷起，收卷(帆、旗等)
entry.def: When you furl something made of fabric such as an umbrella, sail, or flag, you roll or fold it up because it is not going to be used.

example.ex: An attempt was made to furl the headsail.

sentences.sentence: "furled sails bound securely to the spar"
"his rolled umbrella hanging on his arm"
